notes:
Appeared during [[Tibia's 15th Anniversary|Tibia's 15th]] and [[Tibia's 20th Anniversary|20th Anniversary]] celebrations, in a raid at a random time once a day.
The following message will appear:
{{Server Message|A muse has appeared south of Vengoth castle and creative energy is starting to form.}}
Then, 20 minutes later he will spawns:
{{Server Message|Penciljack is in the house! Try fight him south of Vengoth castle - if you dare.}}
name: Penciljack (Creature)
strategy:
Unknown.
[[File:Tibia's 15th Anniversary! 10 Penciljack!|thumb|300px|right|Video showing an encounter with Penciljack.]]
